Data: Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run a bouncer first up, it hurries Khawaja as he hooks this, rolling the wrists to get it to fine leg along the ground

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, 1 run 140kph, he drives on the up to mid off, they think about one but wisely stay home, Imad fires at the striker's end, hits the stumps and they get a single on the ricochet!
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 2 runs fuller on middle, he wristily whips this through midwicket for a couple
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run 141kph, fuller length outside off, he tries to drive and mistimes this dragging it to mid on
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run 140kph, short ball, he controls a pull shot well forward of square to a sweeper in the deep

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, FOUR runs magnificent straight drive! Almost a caught and bowled chance but Finch smoked it so quickly back past him he had no chance. It wasn't a half-volley but he stood tall and drove it hard through the line back past Hasnain
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run tossed up outside off, he reaches forward and defends
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs a reverse sweep and he beats short third man! It was outside off, he set up early, got the length he wanted and picked the gap past short third man with nice timing
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run tossed up outside off, he drives, turning the wrists to work it to long on
Imad Wasim to Finch, 2 runs drifting into leg stump, he clips this through square leg with control for a couple
Imad Wasim to Finch, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he drives firmly to long on
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run shaped to reverse and then changed his mind and tried a conventional sweep, it clipped the pad and was blocked by Rizwan

Mohammad Hasnain to Finch, OUT LBW! Hasnain breaks through! Full and straight, just tailing in a touch, Finch hangs right back in his crease and tries to whip square and is beaten for pace. He is hit right infront of leg stump and is given out! Finch didn't review. He was annoyed he missed it. Hasnain has a wicket to remember!
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, no run 142kph, good length angling across the left-hander and he leaves it alone
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, no run beaten by a beauty! 143kph, good length, shaping late past the groping bat of Marsh as he prodded from the crease
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 run 143kph, fuller length, he defends with soft hands towards mid off who is deep and calls for a single immediately. Well run
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run 144kph, full on middle and leg, he whips this elegantly through square leg to the sweeper in the deep
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, no run short and wide of off, he jumps in the air trying to get on top of a cut but chops it down off the bottom edge to second slip
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run tossed up outside off, he drives down to long on
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run darted in flatter towards off, he defends from the crease to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run tossed up on off, he whips this off the front foot to square leg
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run shorter and sliding on, he is pushing from the crease but can't beat midwicket
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run floated up on off, he reaches out and defends with the full face
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run flatter and quicker, he's back and defending towards midwicket
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run 142kph, full and angled across and he flashes and misses at a drive. Beaten for pace
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, no run 141kph, back of a length, he tries to whip square but is hit on the thigh pad
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run 142kph, fuller on off, he whips extravagantly through forward square to the sweeper in the deep
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 run short ball, 137kph, he pulls powerfully but straight to deep square
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run 145kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this square past the square leg umpire
Mohammad Hasnain to Marsh, 1 run tries to square drive from the crease and gets a thick bottom edge that runs to third man for one
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run floated up on middle and leg, and it's tucked to midwicket
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run Imad fumbles a stop as another full one is tapped back to him, but they decide not to run on the misfield
Imad Wasim to Marsh, 2 runs spinning down the leg side, flicking the pad on the way through. Imad is finding some turn when he gives the ball a little more air
Imad Wasim to Marsh, no run nudged with the spin to midwicket

Imad Wasim to Marsh, OUT Marsh runs past one! He left his crease, looking to get to the pitch, but he just never got there and his momentum was still taking him forward even as the ball spun past his inside edge and Rizwan whipped the bails off
Imad Wasim to Handscomb, no run chipped uppishly, but well wide of the bowler. It just stopped on Handscomb as he lunged forward at it. Mid on trots around to cut it off
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run Hasnain comes around the stumps, offering Khawaja width outside off. It's driven, but there's protection in the deep
Mohammad Hasnain to Handscomb, 1 wide slanting down the leg side, and Rizwan dives smartly at his left to save extras
Mohammad Hasnain to Handscomb, no run that's better from the young quick, aiming for the top of off. Defended to cover

Mohammad Hasnain to Handscomb, 2 runs Handscomb sends a length delivery bouncing out to the cover sweeper with a crunchy punch, and the fielder in the deep is caught napping a little as they take him on for a second run
Mohammad Hasnain to Handscomb, 1 run just a hint of shape in to the batsman, and a drive is stopped at cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 2 runs Khawaja steps into a fluent drive, long off getting around the boundary to keep them to two
Mohammad Hasnain to Khawaja, 1 run whipped out into the leg side, and a single keeps him on strike
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja bends low to sweep, and it doesn't get far but there's time for a single
Imad Wasim to Handscomb, 1 run punched out through cover, off the back foot
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run flapped one-handed into the leg side, but he can't beat the field
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 2 runs Khawaja reverse sweeps, Umar Akmal diving over the ball at short third man to allow runs
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run that's a much better stop from Shan Masood, who dives smartly to his left to stop a powerfully-struck orthodox sweep
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off the pads for a single
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run lobbed up and well wide of Khawaja, who lets it pass him
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run legbreak, but nothing extravagant and Khawaja works him fine of short fine leg
Yasir Shah to Handscomb, no run Handscomb stays deep and presses to cover
Yasir Shah to Handscomb, 1 run nurdled into the leg side, Handscomb again playing him from the crease
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run floating towards leg stump, and it's neatly flicked off the toes
Yasir Shah to Handscomb, no run punched firmly off the back foot, but he can't beat the fielder in the ring
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run swept hard, but he finds the fielder at deep backward square
Imad Wasim to Handscomb, 1 run Handscomb gives the cover sweeper some work to do, the batsmen trotting through for a single
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 2 runs Khawaja sets himself for a reverse sweep, but the ball's not where he wants it so he reverts to the paddle sweep at the last moment, tucking it nice and fine
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run beaten outside off by one that doesn't turn as expected
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run glanced off the hip, but straight at the fielder

Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 bye was there an edge here? Yes! Imad finds the edge of a forward poke, but it's quite thick and Rizwan can't get his gloves around it. Tough chance, but a chance all the same
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run Khawaja stays deep and flicks wristily to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, FOUR runs wonderful placement from Khawaja, threading a measured drive through the gap at cover and right between the fielders in the deep to pick up four
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run another reverse sweep, and he doesn't get all of it but they find a single
Yasir Shah to Handscomb, 1 run a touch too full, outside off, and Handscomb drives to long off
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run Khawaja drives, but this time the shot is stopped by a tumbling cover fielder
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run flicked off the pads and down to fine leg
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs speared in flat outside off, but Khawaja meets it with a confident slog sweep, lifting the ball over midwicket. It looks like he's got the measure of this pitch now
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run a single behind square on the off side turns the strike over

Imad Wasim to Handscomb, OUT caught at slip! Imad had kept the slip in for Handscomb since he arrived at the crease, and it's paid off. The batsman comes down and tries to flick to leg, but the ball - which is flighted, and spins - takes a thick edge, bouncing off the pad and flying at a comfortable catching height to slip
Imad Wasim to Stoinis, 1 run eased down to long off, and he's off the mark straight away
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run
Imad Wasim to Stoinis, 1 run punched firmly back at Imad, who creaks slowly into a dive as it bounces under him to allow a single

Yasir Shah to Stoinis, OUT bowled by a googly! Pitched up and straight. Stoinis is expecting the legbreak, and plays down the wrong line. The ball doesn't turn big, but it's enough to beat him, zipping through the gate to hit the stumps
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run flighted, outside off, and a drive bounces down to long off
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja leans forward with an angled bat, getting it behind point for a single
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run Yasir gives it plenty of air, and Maxwell's drive is stopped at cover
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run worked wide of mid on for a single
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run Khawaja looks to nudge a full one away into the leg side, but he can't find the gap
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell takes his bottom hand off the bat as he slices a drive through point

Imad Wasim to Khawaja, FOUR runs misfield at long on! It's Hasnain. Khawaja pushed it softly down the ground, and Hasnain should have stopped it easily, but he lets it go past for four and that's Khawaja's fifty. It went right through his legs
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, no run pushed defensively into the leg side
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run pressed out to the cover sweeper for a single
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run flicked just wide of midwicket, quick single
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja works off his pad, and he'll keep the strike
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run whipped smartly off the toes, and out to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run slapped with purpose, but straight to point
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, SIX runs swatted over long on! Maxwell spotted a flighted delivery outside off, planted his front foot down the track, and lifted it cleanly over long on

Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run is this a missed chance? Yes! Maxwell backs away to cut off the stumps, but he gets a thin edge. Rizwan took his eye off it behind the stumps, perhaps expecting that it would hit the stumps. The ball bounces out of his gloves, and Maxwell survives
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run straight, and it's worked to leg for a single
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, no run Imad attacks the stumps, Maxwell defends
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, FOUR runs paddled down to fine leg. It's not quite the sweep, more of a front foot paddle, but it goes fine of Umar Akmal at short fine leg and away for runs
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run punched out to the sweeper for a single
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja whips across a drifting delivery, turning the strike over with a single
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run placed through cover point, just the one
Imad Wasim to Khawaja, 1 run this keeps a little low, but Khawaja jabs down on it in time and collects a single to long on
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja reads the length early and employs his wrists to milk a single into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run Maxwell is forward when he should have been back and a thick outside edge lobs through the area where gully would have been
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run nudged to mid on, where Shinwari is well inside the circle
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell sets himself for a big heave into the leg side, but the ball rushes on to him, coming of the inside half of the shot and bouncing into the leg side

Yasir Shah to Khawaja, FOUR runs timing and placement! Khawaja has put in the work getting himself in, and he's finding some fluency now, bending into a reverse sweep that goes exactly where he want it to
Yasir Shah to Khawaja, no run Yasir ends with a quicker ball that is tucked defensively to leg
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, and it's flicked behind square
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run Haris is much slower through the air, this one floating down at 81km/h, Khawaja dabbing to short third man
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, no run worked to midwicket
Haris Sohail to Khawaja, 1 run the same shot goes just wide of that midwicket fielder this time, and there's room for a single
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, no run Maxwell gets back and waits deep in the crease, but his punch finds cover
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, FOUR runs quick hands! Haris strays down leg, and Maxwell punishes him, whipping his hands down into a very fine sweep

Yasir Shah to Khawaja, OUT Khawaja misses a sweep! He'd been playing the shot so well, but he just missed this straighter one from Yasir. The appeal is immediate and emotive, and Umpire Dharmasena raises the finger. Khawaja departs just as he was looking to kick on for a hard-fought 62, and Pakistan keep themselves in the game
Yasir Shah to Carey, no run nicely flighted on middle and off, Carey nudging watchfully into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Carey, 1 run straight again, but fuller this time and Carey is off the mark with a glance to fine leg
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run this one is flighted up just a bit too high, Maxwell driving a full toss out to long off
Yasir Shah to Carey, no run Carey is forward and defends the ball with slightly hard hands, but smothers it well enough
Yasir Shah to Carey, 1 run pushed down to long on for a single
Haris Sohail to Carey, 1 run swept through square leg, just the one
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, no run front foot defence squirts to cover
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, no run Maxwell looks for a single close in on the leg side, but there's none to be had
Haris Sohail to Maxwell, 1 run pressed firmly down to long off for one
Haris Sohail to Carey, no run Carey comes forward to defend with the spin into the leg side
Haris Sohail to Carey, 1 run glanced off his pads for a single
Yasir Shah to Carey, FOUR runs Carey picks up where Khawaja left off! A competent reverse sweep sends the ball bouncing away behind square for his first boundary
Yasir Shah to Carey, 2 runs orthodox sweep now, and the fielder in the deep keeps them to two
Yasir Shah to Carey, 1 run another sweep from Carey, but Shan Masood dives at short fine leg to stop it
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run nicely flighted, on middle and leg, and Maxwell defends
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run another legbreak, slightly flatter, and Maxwell drives softly to cover
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run he's forward again, driving to mid off
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run he starts full, just outside off, and Carey pings the cover field with a drive
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run Carey comes forward again, angling his dab to run the ball to gully
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run Shinwari keeps it full, and a drive is stopped at mid off
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run Shinwari attacks the stumps, Carey nudging with the angle into the leg side
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, no run he hits a length, just outside off, and Maxwell pokes watchfully to cover
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell uses his bottom hand to work the ball into the gap near midwicket, and keeps the strike

Yasir Shah to Maxwell, FOUR runs nearly caught at long on! It was tossed up outside off, he hammers this hard and flat at long on, Junaid comes it but doesn't get there and just bounces short of him and goes through him for four!
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run shorter ball, he cuts off the back foot to cover-point
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run slid through, he's back and defending
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run tossed up, he reaches forward and defends on the front foot
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run straighter on middle and leg, he stretches out and defends
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run shorter length, he's back and punching to cover-point but can't beat the man
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run fuller length, he pushes on the front foot towards cover
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to cover-point
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run fuller length outside off, he pushes a drive firmly to mid off
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run shorter length, hurries him as he tries to pull, he mistimes it to midwicket and looks for one but is wisely sent back by Maxwell
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run 136kph, full angled into leg stump, he glances this nicely down to fine leg
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 3 runs full outside off, he drives this with ease through cover, and Abid runs around from deep point but slides too early, he misfields on the rope to allow three
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run he is back and punching this to point, Shan races in but fumbles! A clean pick up and throw might have stretched the batsmen
Yasir Shah to Carey, 1 run sweeps from middle stump to deep fine leg
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, FOUR runs short drag down and he's back and pounding a pull shot through midwicket! Nice footwork from Maxwell to seize on the short length
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run looped up on middle and leg, he drives to long on
Yasir Shah to Carey, no run shorter length, he's back and working this to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Carey, no run beaten by a top spinner. It was a good length outside off, he played for the wrong un and it bounced a touched and beat the inside edge as he pushes away from his body
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run good length, outside off, he pushes from the crease to the gap at cover-point
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run 139kph, fuller length, he drives handsomely but straight to mid off
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run 138kph, angled into middle and leg, he clips this neatly through square midwicket to the sweeper in the deep
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run fuller outside off, he drives slowly to mid off and goes with the stroke for a single
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run good length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot dragging it to midwicket
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run 136kph, full angled into off, he drives with the full face straight of mid on and pinches a single as the man has to move to his left on the circle
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run full outside off, tailing away a touch, he square drives but doesn't time it, picking out backward point
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run good length wide of off, he tries to open the face and run it to third man but Shan darts across from backward point to cut it off with a good dive
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run 144kph, shorter length, he's back and running this past Shan this time to wide third man for a single
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, he's back and opening the face to dab this to the gap at gully for a single
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 2 runs fuller on middle, he turns the wrists and works this through midwicket and calls two straight away. They run well and get back easily
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run 143kph, yorker on off, he squeezes it out to backward point and again Shan makes a good stop diving to his right
Junaid to Maxwell, no run shorter length but cramping him for room, he tries to late cut but chops a bottom edge to the keeper
Junaid to Maxwell, no run bouncer, 130kph, that sticks in the wicket a touch, he tries to pull but mistimes it to midwicket
Junaid to Maxwell, no run 120kph, back of a length, top of off, he stands tall and punches to mid on
Junaid to Maxwell, no run slower ball bouncer outside off and he leaves this alone
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run well directed short ball at the body but he controls a pull shot well to the man at deep square
Junaid to Carey, no run huge LBW appeal but not out. It was full and tailing late back into Carey, he was hit flush on the front pad but it was sliding down leg
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run good length, off stump, he just pushes from the crease towards mid on on the circle
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 2 runs 145kph, over-pitched and he drives very elegantly wide of cover, forcing deep cover-point to come around and cut it off
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run 141kph, good length angled across, he opens the face and runs this neatly to third man
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run 120kph slower ball outside off, deceives him as he pushes away from his body, he gets a thick inside edge that runs away behind square
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 2 runs short slower ball, he watches it closely and controls a pull shot behind square into the gap and again they run really well for two
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run 145kph full toss outside off and he misses attempting a booming drive. It beat him for speed
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run 131kph, full targeting middle, he stays leg side and punches a drive to mid on who stays right on the circle and allows one
Junaid to Carey, no run good length, angled into leg, he defends from the crease, cramped for room
Junaid to Carey, 1 run good length off cutter on middle, he tucks this off the pads forward of square for a single
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run short slower ball, Maxwell waits and pulls this well but straight to the man at wide fine leg
Junaid to Carey, 1 run yorker length, middle and leg, he glances this to fine leg with the angle
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run slower short ball and he toe-ends it in the air and it falls safely at cover-point! It was so slow off the pitch he got through the pull shot too soon but it fell safely
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 wide drifting down leg and it's called wide
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run short and wide, he chops a cut shot though cover-point and the sweeper has to sprint in off the rope to prevent the Australians taking a second. They wanted it
Imad Wasim to Carey, 1 run shorter outside off, he's back and forcing this firmly to deep cover-point
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run full and drifting into leg, he drives firmly to long on. 50 for Maxwell. Two in a row
Imad Wasim to Carey, 1 run reverse sweep gets a top edge at it just balloons over Hasnain's head! He was back-pedalling at short third man but it just cleared him!

Imad Wasim to Maxwell, SIX runs boom! Over long on! Into the upper deck! This was in the slot and he cleared the left leg and swung hard. It made a superb sound off the bat as he struck it so sweetly. It went 99 metres!
Imad Wasim to Maxwell, 1 run shorter length, he's back and tucking this square of midwicket
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run 88kph shorter leg break, he's back trying to pull, it slides on, catches the inside edge and hits the inside of the knee
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, no run slower leg break, wide of off, he tries to cut and misses

Yasir Shah to Maxwell, SIX runs off the back foot over the sight screen! Are you kidding! It was fractionally short, he hung back, cleared the front leg and slapped it straight back down the ground over the sight screen! Ridiculous
Yasir Shah to Maxwell, 1 run shorter and wider, he's back and cutting to deep point
Yasir Shah to Carey, 2 runs slider wide of off, he's placing this nicely wide of deep cover-point and they run well for two
Yasir Shah to Carey, no run fuller outside off, he reaches out and defends to mid off
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run 138kph, good length tailing into middle, he clears the front leg and miscues a heave, it rolls slowly to mid off but they get an easy one
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run good length, tailing away from the left-hander, he gets it off the toe of the bat to backward point
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run 123kph, slower ball on middle and leg, he pushes on the front foot straight to cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run 142kph, short ball, he is surprised by the bounce and just rolls a pull shot behind square for a single
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, no run backs away early, Hasnain fires a full wide delivery and he reaches out but misses
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run he steps back and across and tucks a fuller delivery neatly towards mid on for a single
Junaid to Maxwell, no run full down the leg side, he glances it fine on the full and it bounces off the popping crease but Rizwan makes a great diving save to his left to save four runs
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run short slower ball, he controls a pull shot getting into the line and rolling it to fine leg
Junaid to Carey, 1 run 128kph, yorker, tailing into leg, he backs away and jams this out through midwicket

Junaid to Maxwell, 2 runs full toss, he backs away and slices this high over mid off who is inside the circle, but he didn't middle it, it lands just short of the rope but doesn't reach the rope and they get two
Junaid to Maxwell, no run he charges and backs away, Junaid delivers a short 102kph, bouncer wide of off and it's not called wide. Looked the right call but Maxwell was annoyed.
Junaid to Maxwell, no run another slower ball bouncer, he tries to pull, gets through the shot and is deceived by the slowness, gets a thin edge but it falls well short of Rizwan
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run slower ball banged in, he tries to pull but it just dies off the surface, he gets a bottom edge that bounces to the keeper
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, no run 144kph, half-volley, he clears the front leg and drives but straight t cover
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, FOUR runs short ball and Carey waits and cracks a pull shot through square leg! That was powerfully struck to beat the sweeper. He waited on that nicely
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, FOUR runs short and wide and cut powerfully past backward point! Hasnain pays dearly for not delivering slower balls. He used the pace and smoked it through point
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run full and wide and he hammers a square drive through cover-point, they push for two but the sweeper cuts it off
Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length on off, he steps inside the line and pulls this along the ground to fine leg

Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run short slower ball, he pulls off the toe of the back through midwicket, Maxwell calls for two but Saad Ali races off the rope at midwicket and does well to prevent a second run
Junaid to Carey, 1 run full and tailing into leg, he squirts this out through midwicket for a single
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 wide slower ball bouncer but it's too high and rightly called wide
Junaid to Maxwell, FOUR runs short ball and pulled powerfully behind square! He finally gets this one away after much frustration. He waited on it well
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run full wide yorker, he reaches out and slices this along the ground to third man

Junaid to Carey, 2 byes beautifully bowled but Rizwan misses it to allow byes! It tailed in through the gate from a good length, it just missed leg stump and it kept tailing further after it went past the stumps and Rizwan couldn't stop it
Junaid to Carey, 1 run full yorker on leg, he digs this out towards mid on
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run 135kph, back of a length, he flat bats a pull shot hard to wide long on for a single

Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, (no ball) bowled him! But it's a no-ball! 142kph full and straight and it crashed into middle but he over-stepped! Maxwell was walking off but the TV replay showed he had over-stepped comfortably. Maxwell gets another life
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, FOUR runs launched over square leg one bounce four! Again full and straight, Maxwell sets himself for this one, opens up his hips and flicks it over forward square
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run full and straight again, he hangs back and drags it to midwicket for a single
Usman Shinwari to Carey, no run 139kph, full wide yorker beats the flashing blade of Carey. Well bowled

Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run nearly a run out! Direct hit from Haris would have had him from mid off! It was a short slower ball, he slapped it to mid on on the circle, Carey gave up but the throw was wide
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run full outside off, he opens the face and slices this to third man
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run he charges and backs away, Junaid follows him and jams him up with a good yorker, all he can manage is a single
Junaid to Carey, 1 run 130kph, length ball, tailing in, he tries to launch down the ground but miscues off the inside half of the bat through square midwicket

Junaid to Maxwell, FOUR runs sets up for the scoop and gets it over the keeper's head! Brilliant. He set up early, got the low full toss he wanted and he just ramped it over Rizwan's head for four. So skilful.
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run length ball, he steps inside the line and miscues a heave behind square leg
Junaid to Carey, 2 runs good length, top of off, he stays still and smacks this firmly straight of deep midwicket and into the gap, they are able to run two
Junaid to Carey, 1 run full inswinging yorker, he gets an inside edge onto pad, it runs into the off side for a single

Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run he's nearly run out! He smashed it back at the bowler, Shinwari put his hands up, and knocked it up in the air, they run but the ball rolled behind Shinwari and hit the stumps at the non-striker's but the bails didn't come off! Carey was out. But he survives and gets 50!
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, FOUR runs brilliant stroke! Length ball, he steps inside the line and flicks it fine for four! Into the 90s now
Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, 1 run full outside off, he steers this with the angle through backward point
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 2 runs angled into leg, he flicks this off the pads behind square into the vacant outfield and they pick up two
Usman Shinwari to Carey, 1 run low full toss, he clears the left leg and hammers it straight to mid off and Haris is able to stop it

Usman Shinwari to Maxwell, FOUR runs he ramps this over the fine short third man! He shaped for the leg side ramp, it was angled across, he opened the face and ramped it over short third man! Incredible skills
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run full and wide, he reaches and slaps it through point to the sweeper

Mohammad Hasnain to Maxwell, 1 run, OUT he's run out trying to get back on strike! It was full outside off, he slices this high over backward point, they take one and sprint back for a second, but the throw from the deep by Shan Masood was superb, right alongside the bails, Rizwan barely had to move his gloves and Maxwell was caught just short!
Mohammad Hasnain to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full inswinging yorker, 142kph, he clears the left leg and jams it out to mid off
Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, 1 run full outside off, he steers this through point to the man in the deep
Mohammad Hasnain to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full outside off, he mistimes a drive to Yasir at cover and they only get one

Mohammad Hasnain to Carey, OUT caught at mid off! A low full toss does the job. It just tailed away from Carey late as he swung hard trying to get it down the ground, he hit it off the toe of the bat and it floated down the throat of Haris on the circle at mid on

Innings break Australia make an impressive score in the end. They were 5 for 140 but Maxwell and Carey shared a 134-run stand to dig them out of a hole. Maxwell had a lot of luck but he played some superb shots as well. He ended up two short of a century. He now has five scores in the 90s in ODI cricket but just one century. Carey did a great job in support. Pakistan will rue several missed chances and Shinwari's wicket
7.19pm And Pakistan come out in pursuit of Australia's 277 for 7. Shan Masood is joined by Abid Ali, on debut.
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run on a length and angled across Shan, who raises his hands to leave
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run chopped down to gully, but it's stopped by the fielder
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run past the outside edge, in the channel outside off and Shan pokes at it with flat feet
Coulter-Nile to Masood, no run straighter this time from Coulter-Nile, and Shan taps it back at him
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run long half volley, quite wide of off, but Haris can't find the middle of his drive just yet
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run Kane Richardson hits a length, just outside off, and Abid defends from the crease
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 1 wide speared down the leg side, and he'll have to bowl this one again
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 2 runs and he's off the mark almost straight away, glancing neatly through midwicket for a brace
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 2 runs crunch! Abid's forward into a drive that threads the gap at cover, but it's pulled in by a sliding Finch near the boundary
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run Haris walks into a firm push, on the up, and it's a good-looking shot but finds point
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run punched to cover, where the fielder pulls off a diving stop but can't quite stop the single
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run Coulter-Nile tests him with a short one, and Abid doesn't look entirely comfortable as he pulls one-handed, but manages to keep it down
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run whipped off the hips and down to fine leg for a single
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, no run Abid keeps his left elbow nice and high and his bat perfectly straight as he comes forward to defend
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run Coulter-Nile hits a length just outside off, but he's flicked into space on the leg side and a single is the result
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run Kane keeps it tight on off stump, Abid leaning half forward to defend
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run Abid's forward to drive, but it comes off the very bottom of the bat and goes nowhere
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run Abid's a bit more fluent on the pull this time, swiveling and rolling his wrists, but he picks out short fine leg

Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, FOUR runs there's the middle! This is just short of a good length, outside off, and Abid picks up the length very early, rocking back to pull well in front of square and right out of the middle. Boom!
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run sharp stop by a diving midwicket. This would have been another boundary had he not dived down at it, so sweetly was it struck. Off the front foot this time
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 2 runs a scything square slash bursts through the left hand of point, and it's a single as he takes some of the vim out of the shot
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run whipped away for a single

Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, FOUR runs sweetly driven by Abid, who steps forward into the perfect position before lacing a classical cover drive through the off side field. He holds his balance and the shot
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, no run this isn't quite there to drive, but fast hands from Abid means the cover fielder is tested
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, FOUR runs through cover point now! Abid leans back as Coulter-Nile offers width outside off, standing up and punching square
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, no run fiercely struck once again, but Maxwell at point stops this cleanly. It was four if he missed it
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run a controlled pull sends the ball bouncing out to deep square leg, and they're through for one
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run Richardson aims for the top of off, but it's kept out with solid defence
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run punched firmly, on the up, but a dive at cover saves runs. Abid is putting these fielders under pressure
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, FOUR runs down to fine leg! Abid hops into a whip-pull as Richardson strays down leg, placing it past short fine leg and away for four
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 2 runs strong wristwork from Abid sends the ball racing out to deep midwicket, and it's stopped in the deep
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 1 run Abid glances in front of his pads, and the man at deep backward square has work to do
Kane Richardson to Haris Sohail, no run Haris leans forward into a languid drive, a diving Maxwell at point cutting it off
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run it's short, and Abid leans back into a strong pull, but there's protection in the deep
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run full, just outside off at around 137km/h and Haris is forward to push to point
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 1 run Haris works off his hip for a single through square leg
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run pick-up pull, and it bounces out to deep backward square for one more
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run Coulter-Nile comes around the stumps, Haris tapping into the leg side

Stoinis to Abid Ali, FOUR runs slapped through midwicket! This wasn't even all that short, but Abid picks up the length so early and whips a pull out into the deep, the ball beating a diving fielder near the boundary
Stoinis to Abid Ali, 1 wide sprayed down the leg side, that's wide
Stoinis to Abid Ali, no run Stoinis stays straight, Abid working to midwicket with supple wrists
Stoinis to Abid Ali, no run a back foot punch sends the ball bouncing towards mid on. He hit it too well for any thought of a quick single
Stoinis to Abid Ali, no run Abid keeps his bat nice and straight to push forcefully to mid on again
Stoinis to Abid Ali, 2 runs offcutter at around 121km/h, and it's glanced neatly out to the man at deep midwicket
Stoinis to Abid Ali, no run another neat little flick from Abid, but it's stopped at midwicket inside the circle
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run there's a woody sound as Haris leans forward to drive to mid off, not out of the middle
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, 2 runs chipped in the air, but over the inner ring. The ball plugs in the outfield and they hurry back for a second
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run Haris stands tall and punches to mid on
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run dug in short, Haris ducking underneath it
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, no run again Haris stands at the crease as Coulter-Nile maintains his back-of-a-length approach, punching to cover
Coulter-Nile to Haris Sohail, FOUR runs off the outside edge, but there's no slip in place and it flies down to third man for four. Haris pushed at one that left him
Stoinis to Abid Ali, 1 run just short of a length, and it's pressed to mid off
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run tapped into space, through square leg, and he turns the strike over
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run tapped back to the bowler
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, 2 runs this one angles in and holds its line, Haris flicking in front of square to raise the fifty for Pakistan. It's also the fifty stand between these two
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run chopped down to point
Stoinis to Haris Sohail, no run angling in once again, Haris defending from the crease
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run not quite full enough to draw Abid forward, and he works with the spin, through square leg
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run Haris nurdles uppishly into the leg side, but finds the gap
Lyon to Abid Ali, no run Abid nudges to leg and wants a single, but the fielder is quickly in and he's sent back

Lyon to Abid Ali, no run sharp spin in to him! Abid was back and across, setting himself for a cut. Is it pad first? There was definitely some bat involved. The umpire's not convinced, and Australia don't want a review. But that's his first false stroke
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run tapped softly into space, in front of point
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run Haris forces off the back foot, and a fumble from Stoinis at cover allows them to get through for one
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run floated up on off stump at 84km/h, not much spin first up
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run beaten on the cut, Haris leaning back and flashing across a googly. There was hardly room for the shot
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run punched through cover, off a middle stump line
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run pushed through a bit flatter and quicker on off stump, and Abid is into the 40s with a push in front of point
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run legbreak, but it's too short and Haris works him easily through midwicket
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run flicked off the toes and into the gap at midwicket
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run Lyon's turning it more than Zampa, but Abid works with the turn to find a single on the leg side
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run Haris is a little squared up as he closes the face of the bat on a defensive poke
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run front foot defence sends the ball bouncing to point
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run Haris stays deep, but he can't find the gap with his back foot punch into the covers
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run tapped towards mid on, and they seize the chance for a quick single
Lyon to Abid Ali, 2 runs placed behind point, Abid setting off immediately into a run and rushing back for the second
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run spinning gently back into Haris, who flicks off his pads for one
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run Abid flicks to leg and calls immediately and loudly for a quick single
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run Haris comes down the track and taps the ball hard back to Zampa, who can't quite stop it cleanly
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run tossed up nicely on off stump, Abid coming forward to smother it
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run Abid spots some width and hops onto the back foot, but his slashing cut bounces straight to short third man
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run googly from Zampa, but it's read and kept out by Abid
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run gem of a delivery! Turn and bounce for Lyon, and Haris can't put bat to ball with his defensive push
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run slightly flatter at 87km/h, and it's forced to cover
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run nudged into space, wide of mid on
Lyon to Abid Ali, no run worked with the spin into the leg side
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run Abid aims straighter with his nudge this time, and finds the gap for a single
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 1 run thumped down to long off for a single that keeps him on strike
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run tossed right up to him, Haris flicking off his toes for a single
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run googly, but it's read and solidly defended to cover
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run legbreak this time, and quite flat at 89km/h. Abid keeps his back foot anchored and pokes defensively at it
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run Zampa lets slip with a low full toss, just outside off, but it's only a single to long off
Zampa to Haris Sohail, no run floated up very full, and Haris digs it out back to the bowler
Zampa to Haris Sohail, 1 run Haris jumps out to meet it on the full and thumps a drive out to the cover sweeper
Lyon to Haris Sohail, no run pushed through nice and full at 89km/h, Haris pushing it back down the track
Lyon to Haris Sohail, 2 runs Haris uses his wrists to work the ball wide of long on, and it's placed well enough for a second run
Lyon to Rizwan, no run he skips down first ball and drives nicely back to the bowler
Lyon to Rizwan, no run advances again, not quick to the pitch, whipping to midwicket
Lyon to Rizwan, no run looped up outside off, he stretches forward to smother the spin
Finch to Abid Ali, 1 run tossed up outside off, he square drives firmly to deep cover-point
Finch to Rizwan, no run short drag down, he's back and cracking a pull shot straight to midwicket and Stoinis makes the save
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run fuller on middle, he drives down to long on
Finch to Abid Ali, 1 run shorter ball, he's back and pulling firmly to long on
Finch to Rizwan, no run looped up slow outside off, it spins away and beats the edge. Beautifully bowled
Finch to Rizwan, 1 run short slow and wide, 75kph, he's back and waiting, and waiting, and then cutting to deep cover-point
Lyon to Rizwan, FOUR runs full toss and he reaches outside off and hammers a sweep hard forward of square! He smoked that very hard to beat the sweeper on the rope
Lyon to Rizwan, no run looped slower on a good length outside off, he defends from the crease
Lyon to Rizwan, no run nice over-spin, he's back and defending from the crease
Lyon to Rizwan, no run slower outside off, he skips down the track and is beaten in flight, he works this to midwicket
Lyon to Rizwan, no run tossed up, he advances and thrusts his pad at it to kick it away
Lyon to Rizwan, FOUR runs another sweep from outside off and he gets this behind square! He is waiting for the length, he plays a textbook sweep from outside off roping it through square leg
Finch to Abid Ali, no run floated up slowly, 77kph, on middle, he defends
Finch to Abid Ali, 1 run tossed up on middle, he drives down to long on. 50 on debut for Abid Ali. He is very happy about it
Finch to Rizwan, FOUR runs another sweep for four! This again from way outside off. The reach and skill to flick it behind square is brilliant
Finch to Rizwan, SIX runs drag down and he is back and hammering a pull shot high over deep midwicket! Finch under pressure
Finch to Rizwan, no run flatter on middle, he defends from the crease
Finch to Rizwan, FOUR runs another sweep behind square! He keeps feeding the length, Rizwan was down on one knee, smashing it from middle and leg behind square for four!
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run a paddle sweep with the turn fine but they will only get one
Lyon to Rizwan, no run tossed up outside off, he reaches out and defends

Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run run out chance but he dives in! He whipped it to midwicket and ran on Maxwell, the throw was just wide as Rizwan dived in and he would have been out with a direct hit but was home as Lyon took the ball
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run shorter length, he's quickly back and pulling hard to deep midwicket
Lyon to Rizwan, no run tossed up outside off, he defends from the crease off a thick outside edge
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run floated up outside off, he defends to the gap at point and calls immediately for a single
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run tossed up on leg, he dabs this close into the on side and they run well to pinch one
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run good length on middle, he sits back and tucks it to the gap at square leg
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run slightly shorter, he's back and cutting firmly to deep cover-point
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run on leg stump, he sweeps nicely behind square and Handscomb makes an excellent diving save to keep it to one
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run full toss outside leg, he sweeps but mistimes this to deep backward square
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run good length on leg stump, he's back and whipping this through square leg to the sweeper
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run tossed up, he reaches out and chips it in the air but safely wide of Lyon towards long on
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run dances down quickly and drives along the ground to long on
Lyon to Abid Ali, no run 85kph, off break wide of off, he opens the face and runs it to short third man
Lyon to Abid Ali, no run off break outside off, he covers up with a solid forward defence
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run shorter length, he's back quickly and punching inside out past cover-point to the man in the deep
Lyon to Rizwan, no run beaten by a quicker one that didn't turn. He played from the crease, expecting sharp turn but it zipped past the edge
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run full and drifting into leg, he tries launch this down the ground, gets a thick inside edge that runs to fine leg
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run leg break on middle, he paddle sweeps fine for a single
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run quicker and flatter, he's back and it's nearly squeezing through as he jams the bat down
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run shorter length, he gets down on one knee and paddles it fine for a single
Zampa to Rizwan, no run quicker leg break, 91kph, he defends in hope on the front foot getting a thick inside edge onto pad
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run googly on middle and leg, he defends and turns it behind square for one
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching this to deep cover-point
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run looped up outside leg, he glances with the angle but Handscomb makes a nice diving save at short fine
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run beaten by one that drifts across and slides on outside off
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run quicker and flatter on middle, he's back and defending
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run he punches on the back foot in the air but just short of cover
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run fuller on middle, he shovels a drive firmly with the bottom hand to long on on the bounce
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run shorter on leg, he's back and working this to deep square
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run looped up on off, he defends into the off side and they run brilliantly to pinch a single
Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs full leg break, he's down on one knee and hammering a cover drive to the man in the deep. He struck that powerfully and Coulter-Nile makes a sliding save on the rope.
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run shorter length, he's back and pulling to midwicket
Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs drifting down leg, he sweeps nicely fine for two more

Zampa to Abid Ali, FOUR runs a slog sweep to deep midwicket! Brilliant placement! It was looped up, he got down one knee and smacked up over deep midwicket and found the gap! It bounced just short of going all the way
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run drifting across, pitching on off, he defends on the front foot
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs he miscues this in the air just past the bowler, Maxwell just couldn't reach it with his left hand, it goes straight of long on for two
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run flatter on middle, he defends on the front foot
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run he skips down and is beaten in flight, gets a thick outside edge that goes to cover
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run backs away early outside leg, Maxwell fires it outside leg to cramp him. Well bowled
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run fuller on leg, he drives firmly to long on
Zampa to Rizwan, 2 runs leg break, full outside off, he drives inside out through cover, and it's well placed for two
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run drifting into leg stump, he defends into the leg side for a single
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run nearly caught at mid on! It was short, he was back, he miscued a pull shot in the air wide of mid on, Handscomb runs to his right and dives but it was just short of him
Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs fuller outside off, he gets down low and delicately opens the blade and dabs it fine past the keeper's gloves, brilliant skill, and he picks up two
Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs he dabs again from off stump, fine of short third man and runs two more
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run flatter on middle, he defends with soft hands to the gap at point
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run full on leg, he sweeps firmly behind square for a single
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run an appeal for caught behind!? Given not out. It slid on with the arm past the edge and Carey took the bails off but his back foot was down
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run tossed up on leg, he's down the track and driving to long on
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run 87kph, drifting outside off, he pushes from the crease to cover
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run tossed up on off, he drives neatly to long on
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs tossed up, a full toss, he whips firmly to wide long on, Coulter-Nile slips in the outfield and it allows a second run
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 2 runs 125kph, short ball, he pulls firmly through midwicket for two more
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 1 run full angled into off, he flicks this with a turn of the wrists behind square for a single
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run short and wide, he stands up and cracks a cut shot to deep cover-point
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run shorter length, he's back and punching to cover
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 1 run he charges down the track and pulls a short ball firmly to deep square
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run shorter and wider of off, he runs this off the open face to third man
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run good length on middle, he's back and working this to midwicket
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run good length on leg, he just tucks this around the corner to square leg
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run round arm delivery, it doesn't bounce as expected, he chops a cut shot to cover
Maxwell to Abid Ali, 1 run good length on middle and leg, he sits back and tucks this square of midwicket
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run on the front foot he turns the wrists and works it to the gap at midwicket
Maxwell to Abid Ali, no run he tries to paddle sweep but picks out short fine
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, no run good length outside off, he tries to drive on the up but drags it back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, no run slower ball off cutter, grips in the surface, he plays from the crease dragging it to mid on
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run shorter length, wide of off, he's back and running this to third man
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, 1 run slower ball banged in, he has to pull awkwardly but controls it well enough to deep square leg
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, no run shorter length, he stands tall and punches back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run short and wide, he late cuts nicely but straight to the man at wide third man
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 2 runs full on leg, 133kph, he clips this beautifully through midwicket for a couple. Another 50 for Rizwan. He's played very well
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run back of a length wide of off, he sits back and runs this off the open face to third man
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 2 runs back of a length on off, he flicks this superbly with the bottom hand behind square and Lyon has to make a diving save in the deep
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 2 runs short length and he cracks a pull shot forward of square this time for two more

Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, FOUR runs edged and it flies wide of Carey! This was a good delivery, tempting the drive but it was not that full, a genuine outside edge and it's well wide of the diving keeper and races to the fine third man rope!
Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, no run shorter length, he's back and whipping this powerfully to midwicket but can't beat the fieldsman
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run fuller outside off, he drives neatly to deep cover-point
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run 131kph, bouncer, he ducks underneath it comfortably
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run good slower ball, outside off, deceives him completely as he tries to force off the back foot, beating the edge
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, FOUR runs another edge flies fine of third man! He tried to late cut this but the extra bounce forced the edge, it flies away at a rate of knots to the rope.
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run back of a length on off, he defends on the back foot
Kane Richardson to Abid Ali, no run 128kph, another bouncer, not that short, but he sways underneath it
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, no run fuller on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, no run shorter and wider, he cuts hard but straight to Maxwell at backward point
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 2 runs cracking pull shot off the front foot wide of mid on, who is in the circle, but it slows up on the outfield because of the dew
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, FOUR runs this pull shot makes the rope! This was shorter but it was only chest high, he swivelled and hammered it behind square and it raced to the rope
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run back of a length outside off, he runs this to third man

Coulter-Nile to Abid Ali, 1 run almost run out by a Maxwell direct hit! He dabbed it to point and point and took off, Maxwell swooped to his right, wrong man to take on, he fired at the non-striker's and just missed! Abid was short of his ground as he dived
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run slid through on off, he defends from the crease
Zampa to Abid Ali, no run huge LBW appeal. Not out. Did he hit it? No review from Australia. It looked close as he tried to pull a straighter ball
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run fuller outside off, he pushes this down the ground to long off
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run he skips down and stays leg side to lift this up and over the off side but it lands short of deep cover-point
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run full toss, he just nudges this to midwicket
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run drifting into leg, he skips down and drives to long off
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run he comes down the track, getting to the pitch, and works a single down to long on
Lyon to Abid Ali, no run rushing straight on with the arm, Abid reading it and pushing to cover
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run tapped close in on the leg side but into the gap, and they run a quick single

Lyon to Rizwan, no run beaten on the slog sweep and Carey has the bails off in a flash. It doesn't look like his back foot left the crease, and Rizwan rolls onto his back to have a stretch after missing the shot. A spot of cramp, perhaps? But he's good to go
Lyon to Rizwan, FOUR runs another sweep, and he lays a good chunk of bat on this one and places it nicely behind square to collect another boundary and push Pakistan forward
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run tossed up on off stump, delivered from around the stumps, and it's squirted into a gap at cover for a quick single
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run there's the sweep again, and he connects well but the fielder is in position to stop it - and this is now Pakistan's highest third wicket ODI stand against Australia

Zampa to Abid Ali, no run pushed through by Zampa, and Abid misses the ball as he flicks across his front pad. It looked like it might be headed down the leg side, and Umpire Dharmasena turns the appeal down. Australia reckon he's out - or at least hope so - and they ask for a review. Two reds and an umpire's call on the ball tracker! So Abid survives, on 98
Zampa to Abid Ali, 1 run and he's up to 99 now, glancing through square leg for one
Zampa to Rizwan, no run down the track comes Rizwan, and he slams a drive back at Zampa
Zampa to Rizwan, no run legbreak, flat on off stump, the ball taking the inside edge of a defensive push
Zampa to Rizwan, no run Rizwan jumps down the track, but Zampa adjusts his length and he can only defend

Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run there it is! A hundred on debut for Abid Ali. He's playing his first international at 31, and he wasn't even supposed to be playing today. And now he's become the third Pakistani to score a hundred on his ODI debut
Lyon to Rizwan, no run Rizwan is down on bended knee and sets himself for a late cut, but the ball rushes past him
Lyon to Rizwan, 2 runs Rizwan uses strong wrists to get the ball out to deep midwicket, rushing back for a second run
Lyon to Rizwan, no run tapped back to the bowler

Lyon to Rizwan, FOUR runs wristed to wide long on! Rizwan uses his feet to get close to it, once again using those powerful wrists to fetch the ball powerfully into the leg side. It's perfectly placed too
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run Lyon offers width, but it's just a single out to the sweeper
Zampa to Rizwan, no run pushed firmly back to the bowler
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run a paddle sweep gets it down to fine leg
Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs another paddle sweep, and this one goes even finer

Zampa to Abid Ali, 2 runs slogged up and over mid on, who is up. It's played slightly awkwardly, but lands safely. And that takes Abid to the record for highest score on debut for Pakistan, beating Saleem Elahi's record
Zampa to Abid Ali, FOUR runs clears the left leg, and this time he nails the slog sweep, right into the gap

Zampa to Abid Ali, no run three slog sweeps in a row, but he can't lay a bat on this one. Carey whips the bails off, and there's an appeal ... but it's for caught behind! The umpire says no, so Australia go upstairs for a review. But there's nothing on UltraEdge, so the decision will stand
Lyon to Rizwan, no run pushed back to the bowler
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan skips out and sends a drive skimming to cover, where it's stopped by Finch - but not quickly enough to stop the single
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run short third man tumbles to his left to stop a very late dab, just the single
Lyon to Rizwan, 1 run Rizwan fetches a sweep from outside off, another quick single
Lyon to Abid Ali, 2 runs sliced very fine down towards third man, Khawaja sliding to keep the ball inside the rope down there. He dabbed it right off the stumps, very late
Lyon to Abid Ali, 1 run slapped through cover, one more
Zampa to Rizwan, 1 run
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run he comes forward and checks a drive to cover, who gets low to stop it
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run legbreak, and it grips a little as Umar gets forward again to defend
Zampa to Umar Akmal, no run short, on off stump, and Umar cuts hard into the ground, the ball bouncing up to be stopped by point
Zampa to Umar Akmal, 1 run too short again, and Umar's off the mark with a pull out to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 2 runs a nicely-placed cut bounces out to the deep, behind square, and they're back for a second
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 2 runs well-placed again by Umar, angling a push to get the ball past a diving Khawaja at short third man
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run punched down to long on for a single
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run eased down to long on, and the strike is turned over once more
Maxwell to Umar Akmal, 1 run a sliced drive dribbles through point for one more
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs this one slips out as a low full toss, and it's whipped through midwicket for two more
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, 2 runs enter Saad Ali, who is also on his debut. He's off the mark straight away, nudging off his pads and calling Rizwan through for a hard-run two
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, no run chopped down through gully, but Maxwell dives at backward point to stop the run
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, 1 run angled, but finer this time, and there's an easy single to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run Coulter-Nile aims full, and it's dug out through mid on
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, no run full and straight, Coulter-Nile stopping it in his follow through as it's pushed back at him
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run appeal for lbw as Rizwan misses a sweep and his hit on the pad, but the umpire's not convinced. Maxwell floated that one up really high
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run flatter, shorter, and it's punched through cover
Maxwell to Saad Ali, 1 leg bye another appeal! Saad is hit on the pad as he looks to glance, but it looked like the ball was headed down the leg side anyway
Maxwell to Rizwan, no run a late cut sends the ball bouncing to backward point
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs chopped hard through cover, and there's an immediate call for two. It's a good call, and they're back safely
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run another sweep, and Zampa fumbles his stop at short fine leg ... but they opt not to run off the misfield
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run glanced to midwicket, into the gap
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, 1 run Saad steps into a crunchy drive, and he wants two but he's sent back. It would have been very tight
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run short of a length, just outside off, and Rizwan slugs a front-foot pull out to midwicket, moving into the 90s
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, no run a firm drive finds mid off
Coulter-Nile to Saad Ali, 1 run worked neatly off the hip, the ball bouncing out to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, no run nice yorker from Coulter-Nile, and it's backed up by Maxwell at point, who dives to stop the ball as it's dug out square
Maxwell to Saad Ali, 1 run punched down the ground for one
Maxwell to Rizwan, 2 runs Maxwell lobs a full one up on a leg stump line, from around the wicket, and Rizwan sweeps down to fine leg. It's placed well enough for a second run. Quick running

Maxwell to Rizwan, FOUR runs paddled fine, and Pakistan find a vital boundary! Maxwell fired this one in quicker, but Rizwan was waiting for it with another paddle sweep, getting it fine of Zampa and hitting it well enough for the ball to beat him to the boundary
Maxwell to Rizwan, 1 run he's down the track to get to the pitch, working down to long on
Maxwell to Saad Ali, 2 leg byes Saad comes down the track and is almost beaten behind his legs, but gets some pad on it to find a leg bye
Maxwell to Saad Ali, 1 run Saad spots some width, slicing it square for a single to keep the strike, 11 off the over
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run swatted uppishly into the leg side, but falling safely in front of the fielder
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, 1 run Imad whips a length delivery out to one of the three at deep midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Rizwan, 1 run very full, on off stump, and Rizwan goes to 99 by driving down to long on
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run punched firmly back at the bowler, who can't quite get down quickly enough to stop it, but Lyon comes around from mid off to ensure it's another dot
Coulter-Nile to Imad Wasim, no run Imad backs away and rifles a shot into the off side, but he can't beat Lyon at mid off

Kane Richardson to Rizwan, 1 run short, outside off, and it's slapped hard out to the sweeper for Rizwan to raise his second hundred of the series. And this is only the second time that two Pakistan batsmen have scored ODI hundreds in the same chase
Kane Richardson to Imad Wasim, no run big swish outside off, but he hits only fresh air!
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, no run another play and a miss! Richardson is opting for a short-pitched approach, and Rizwan just cut underneath it
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, FOUR runs this will help a little, Rizwan sprinting down the track and flat-batting another short one straight back over Richardson's head
Kane Richardson to Rizwan, no run on a length, straight, and Rizwan is furious with himself as he can only push it back to the bowler. He was looking for a single to keep the strike
Stoinis to Yasir Shah, 1 run just short of a good length, Yasir slugging it straight down the ground. Long on cleans up, and they only take a single
Stoinis to Rizwan, 1 wide an attempted slower bouncer goes awry, looping way down the leg side
Stoinis to Yasir Shah, 1 run short, rising over off stump, and Yasir can only pull to long on
Stoinis to Usman Shinwari, SIX runs slammed over long off! It was just a good old fashioned slog, but it's cleared the fielder at the boundary to keep Pakistan hoping
Stoinis to Yasir Shah, 1 run another slow bouncer, it's pulled out to deep square leg, and that's the game

And that's all from your commentary team tonight, with Alex Malcolm and Liam Brickhill having kept you informed over the course of the game. Australia's one-day renaissance continues apace, and they will take some serious confidence into the fifth and final game on Sunday. Do join us again for that game. Until then, goodbye!

11.00pm A bizarre chase from Pakistan. Perhaps it was the inexperience in their ranks? It's the fourth time in history that a side has lost an ODI chase with two centurions. Pakistan were cruising when Abid Ali and Mohammad Rizwan were in the midst of their 144-run stand, but when Abid fell after reaching his ton, Australia had their opening. The required rate climbed, Australia found their way back into the game, and n
Australia won by 6 runs
Player of the match is Glenn Maxwell, AUS
